text: Ba ʙa jod ored, ej ʙani Isroil, on zamonro, ki ʙo şumo pajmoni saxt ʙastem, ki imon ʙa Alloh ored va jagona Ūro iʙodat kuned va kūhi Turro ʙar ʙoloi saraton ʙidoştem. Va ʙaroi şumo guftem: On ciro, ki ʙa şumo dodaem, mustahkam ʙigired, vagarna kūhi Turro ʙar ʙolojaton sarnagun sozem va on ciro, ki dar on ast, ʙa xotir ʙidored! To ʙuvad, ki parhezgor ʙoşed
